contents.text: PackageID: al, 0x0009 Version: 1 Extends: None
contents.zh-CHS: PackageID:al，0x0009版本：1扩展：无

contents.text: This package defines events and signals for an analog line.
contents.zh-CHS: 该软件包定义模拟线路的事件和信号。

contents.text: E.9.1 Properties
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.1 性质

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.9.2 Events
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.2 事件

contents.text: onhook EventID: on (0x0004)
contents.zh-CHS: onhook事件ID:on（0x0004）

contents.text: Detects handset going on hook. Whenever an events descriptor is activated that requests monitoring for an on-hook event and the line is already on-hook, then the MG shall behave according to the setting of the "strict" parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测手机挂机。每当激活一个请求监控挂机事件的事件描述符，且线路已经挂机时，MG应根据“strict”参数的设置进行操作。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数：

contents.text: Strict Transition ParameterID: strict (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 严格转换参数ID:严格（0x0001）

contents.text: Type: enumeration
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：枚举

contents.text: Possible values: "exact" (0x00), "state" (0x01), "failWrong" (0x02)
"exact" means that only an actual hook state transition to on-hook is to be recognized;
contents.zh-CHS: “精确”是指仅识别实际的钩子状态转换为钩子状态；

contents.text: "state" means that the event is to be recognized either if the hook state transition is detected or if the hook state is already on-hook;
contents.zh-CHS: “状态”是指如果检测到钩子状态转换，或者钩子状态已经处于钩子状态，则将识别事件；

contents.text: "failWrong" means that if the hook state is already on-hook, the command fails and an error is reported.
contents.zh-CHS: “FailError”表示如果钩子状态已经处于钩子状态，则命令失败并报告错误。

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数：

contents.text: Initial State ParameterID: init (0x0002)
contents.zh-CHS: 初始状态参数ID:init（0x0002）

contents.text: Type: Boolean
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：布尔型

contents.text: Possible values:
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：

contents.text: "True" means that the event was reported because the line was already on-hook when the events descriptor containing this event was activated;
contents.zh-CHS: “True”表示报告该事件，因为在激活包含该事件的事件描述符时，该行已经挂起；

contents.text: "False" means that the event represents an actual state transition to on-hook.
contents.zh-CHS: “False”表示事件表示到挂机的实际状态转换。

contents.text: offhook EventID: of (0x0005)
contents.zh-CHS: 摘机事件ID:of（0x0005）

contents.text: Detects handset going off hook. Whenever an events descriptor is activated that requests monitoring for an off-hook event and the line is already off-hook, then the MG shall behave according to the setting of the "strict" parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测手机挂机。每当激活请求监控脱钩事件的事件描述符且线路已脱钩时，MG应根据“严格”参数的设置进行操作。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数：

contents.text: Strict Transition ParameterID: strict (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 严格转换参数ID:严格（0x0001）

contents.text: Type: enumeration
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：枚举

contents.text: Possible values: "exact" (0x00), "state" (0x01), "failWrong" (0x02)
"exact" means that only an actual hook state transition to off-hook is to be recognized;
contents.zh-CHS: “精确”是指仅识别实际挂钩状态转换为脱钩状态；

contents.text: "state" means that the event is to be recognized either if the hook state transition is detected or if the hook state is already off-hook;
contents.zh-CHS: “状态”是指如果检测到钩子状态转换，或者钩子状态已经脱离钩子，则识别事件；

contents.text: "failWrong" means that if the hook state is already off-hook, the command fails and an error is reported.
contents.zh-CHS: “FailError”意味着如果钩子状态已经脱离钩子，则命令失败并报告错误。

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数

contents.text: Initial State ParameterID: init (0x0002)
contents.zh-CHS: 初始状态参数ID:init（0x0002）

contents.text: Type: Boolean
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：布尔型

contents.text: Possible values:
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：

contents.text: "True" means that the event was reported because the line was already off-hook when the events descriptor containing this event was activated;
contents.zh-CHS: “True”表示报告该事件，因为在激活包含该事件的事件描述符时，该行已脱离挂钩；

contents.text: "False" means that the event represents an actual state transition to off-hook.
contents.zh-CHS: “False”表示该事件表示实际状态转换为脱离连接。

contents.text: flashhook EventID: fl, 0x0006
contents.zh-CHS: flashhook事件ID:fl，0x0006

contents.text: Detects handset flash. A flash occurs when an onhook is followed by an offhook between a minimum and maximum duration.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测手机闪光灯。在最小持续时间和最大持续时间之间，先挂接后挂接断开时会发生闪烁。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数：

contents.text: Minimum duration ParameterID: mindur (0x0004)
contents.zh-CHS: 最小持续时间参数：mindur（0x0004）

contents.text: Type: integer in milliseconds
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：以毫秒为单位的整数

contents.text: Default value is provisioned.
contents.zh-CHS: 已设置默认值。

contents.text: Maximum duration ParameterID: maxdur (0x0005)
contents.zh-CHS: 最大持续时间参数ID:maxdur（0x0005）

contents.text: Type: integer in milliseconds
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：以毫秒为单位的整数

contents.text: Default value is provisioned.
contents.zh-CHS: 已设置默认值。

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数：

contents.text: None
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.9.3 Signals
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.3 信号

contents.text: ring SignalID: ri, 0x0002
contents.zh-CHS: 环形信号ID:ri，0x0002

contents.text: Applies ringing on the line
contents.zh-CHS: 在线路上应用振铃

contents.text: Signal Type: TimeOut
contents.zh-CHS: 信号类型：超时

contents.text: Duration: Provisioned
contents.zh-CHS: 持续时间：已设置

contents.text: Additional parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他参数：

contents.text: Cadence ParameterID: cad (0x0006)
contents.zh-CHS: Cadence参数ID:cad（0x0006）

contents.text: Type: list of integers representing durations of alternating on and off segments, constituting a complete ringing cycle starting with an on. Units in milliseconds
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：表示交替接通和断开段持续时间的整数列表，构成从接通开始的完整振铃周期。单位（毫秒）

contents.text: Default is fixed or provisioned. Restricted function MGs may ignore cadence values they are incapable of generating.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值是固定的或已设置的。受限函数MGs可能会忽略它们无法生成的节奏值。

contents.text: Frequency ParameterID: freq (0x0007)
contents.zh-CHS: 频率参数ID:freq（0x0007）

contents.text: Type: integer in Hz
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：以赫兹为单位的整数

contents.text: Default is fixed or provisioned. Restricted function MGs may ignore frequency values they are incapable of generating.
contents.zh-CHS: 默认值是固定的或已设置的。受限函数MGs可能忽略其无法生成的频率值。

contents.text: E.9.4 Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.4 统计数字

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.9.5 Procedures
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.5 程序

contents.text: If the MGC sets an EventsDescriptor containing a hook state transition event (on-hook or off-hook) with the "strict" (0x0001) parameter set to "failWrong", and the hook state is already what the transition implies, the execution of the command containing that EventsDescriptor fails. The MG SHALL include error code 540 "Unexpected initial hook state" in its reponse.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果MGC将包含钩子状态转换事件（钩子上或钩子下）的EventsDescriptor设置为“strict”（0x0001）参数设置为“FailError”，并且钩子状态已经是转换所暗示的状态，则包含该EventsDescriptor的命令的执行将失败。MG应在其响应中包含错误代码540“意外初始挂钩状态”。

contents.text: E.9.6 Error code
contents.zh-CHS: E.9.6 错误代码

contents.text: This package defines a new error code:
contents.zh-CHS: 此程序包定义了一个新的错误代码：

contents.text: 540 - Unexpected initial hook state
contents.zh-CHS: 540-意外的初始挂钩状态

contents.text: The procedure for use of this code is given in E.9.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范的使用程序见E.9.5。

contents.text: E.10 Basic Continuity Package
contents.zh-CHS: E.10基本连续性包

contents.text: PackageID: ct (0x000a) Version: 1 Extends: None
contents.zh-CHS: PackageID:ct（0x000a）版本：1扩展：无

contents.text: This package defines events and signals for continuity test. The continuity test includes provision of either a loopback or transceiver functionality.
contents.zh-CHS: 该包定义了连续性测试的事件和信号。连续性测试包括提供环回或收发器功能。

contents.text: E.10.1 Properties
None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.10.2 Events
Completion EventID: cmp, 0x0005
contents.zh-CHS: 完成事件ID:cmp，0x0005

contents.text: This event detects test completion of continuity test.
contents.zh-CHS: 此事件检测连续性测试的测试完成。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数

contents.text: Result ParameterID: res (0x0008)
contents.zh-CHS: 结果参数：res（0x0008）

contents.text: Type: enumeration
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：枚举

contents.text: Possible values: success (0x0001), failure (0x0000)
E.10.3 Signals
Continuity test SignalID: ct (0x0003)
contents.zh-CHS: 连续性测试信号ID:ct（0x0003）

contents.text: Initiates sending of continuity test tone on the termination to which it is applied.
contents.zh-CHS: 在应用连续性测试音的终端上启动连续性测试音的发送。

contents.text: Signal Type: TimeOut
contents.zh-CHS: 信号类型：超时

contents.text: Default value is provisioned
contents.zh-CHS: 已设置默认值

contents.text: Additional parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他参数：

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: Respond SignalID: rsp (0x0004)
contents.zh-CHS: 响应信号ID:rsp（0x0004）

contents.text: The signal is used to respond to a continuity test. See E.10.5 for further explanation.
contents.zh-CHS: 该信号用于响应连续性测试。更多说明见E.10.5。

contents.text: Signal Type: On/Off
contents.zh-CHS: 信号类型：开/关

contents.text: Default duration is provisioned
contents.zh-CHS: 已设置默认持续时间

contents.text: Additional parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他参数：

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.10.4 Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: E.10.4 统计数字

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.10.5 Procedures
When a MGC wants to initiate a continuity test, it sends a command to the MG containing:
contents.zh-CHS: 当MGC想要启动连续性测试时，它会向MG发送一个命令，其中包含：

contents.text: - a signals descriptor with the ct signal; and
contents.zh-CHS: - 具有所述ct信号的信号描述符；和

contents.text: - an events descriptor containing the cmp event.
contents.zh-CHS: - 包含cmp事件的事件描述符。

contents.text: Upon reception of a command containing the ct signal and cmp event, the MG initiates the continuity test tone for the specified Termination. If the return tone is detected and any other required conditions are satisfied before the signal times out, the cmp event shall be generated with the value of the result parameter equal to success. In all other cases, the cmp event shall be generated with the value of the result parameter equal to failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收到包含ct信号和cmp事件的命令后，MG启动指定终端的连续性测试音。如果在信号超时之前检测到返回音且满足任何其他要求的条件，则应生成cmp事件，结果参数的值等于success。在所有其他情况下，生成cmp事件时，结果参数的值应等于故障。

contents.text: When a MGC wants the MG to respond to a continuity test, it sends a command to the MG containing a signals descriptor with the rsp signal. Upon reception of a command with the rsp signal, the MG either applies a loopback or (for 2-wire circuits) awaits reception of a continuity test tone. In the loopback case, any incoming information shall be reflected back as outgoing information. In the 2-wire case, any time the appropriate test tone is received, the appropriate response tone should be sent. The MGC determines when to remove the rsp signal.
contents.zh-CHS: 当MGC希望MG响应连续性测试时，它向MG发送一个命令，其中包含带有rsp信号的信号描述符。接收到带有rsp信号的命令后，MG应用环回或（对于双线电路）等待接收到连续性测试音。在环回情况下，任何传入信息应作为传出信息反射回来。在双线情况下，无论何时收到适当的测试音，都应发送适当的响应音。MGC确定何时删除rsp信号。

contents.text: When a continuity test is performed on a Termination, no echo devices or codecs shall be active on that Termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 在终端上执行连续性测试时，该终端上不得有激活的回波设备或编解码器。

contents.text: Performing voice path assurance as part of continuity testing is provisioned by bilateral agreement between network operators.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为连续性测试的一部分执行语音路径保证由网络运营商之间的双边协议规定。

contents.text: (Informative Note) Example tones and test procedure details are given in Q.724 sections 7 and 8, Q.764 section 2.1.8 and Q.1902.4.
contents.zh-CHS: （资料性说明）Q.724第7节和第8节、Q.764第2.1.8节和Q.1902.4节给出了示例音调和测试程序细节。

contents.text: E.11 Network Package
contents.zh-CHS: E.11网络包

contents.text: PackageID: nt (0x000b) Version: 1 Extends: None
contents.zh-CHS: PackageID:nt（0x000b）版本：1扩展：无

contents.text: This package defines properties of network terminations independent of network type.
contents.zh-CHS: 此包定义独立于网络类型的网络终端的属性。

contents.text: E.11.1 Properties
Maximum Jitter Buffer PropertyID: jit (0x0007)
contents.zh-CHS: 最大抖动缓冲区属性ID:jit（0x0007）

contents.text: This property puts a maximum size on the jitter buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性为抖动缓冲区设置最大大小。

contents.text: Type: integer in milliseconds
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：以毫秒为单位的整数

contents.text: Possible values: This property is specified in milliseconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：此属性以毫秒为单位指定。

contents.text: Defined in: LocalControlDescriptor
contents.zh-CHS: 在中定义：LocalControlDescriptor

contents.text: Characteristics: read/write
contents.zh-CHS: 特征：读/写

contents.text: E.11.2 Events
network failure EventID: netfail, 0x0005
contents.zh-CHS: 网络故障事件ID:netfail，0x0005

contents.text: The termination generates this event upon detection of a failure due to external or internal network reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: 当检测到由于外部或内部网络原因导致的故障时，终端将生成此事件。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数

contents.text: cause ParameterID: cs (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 原因参数ID:cs（0x0001）

contents.text: Type: string
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：字符串

contents.text: Possible values: any text string
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：任何文本字符串

contents.text: This parameter may be included with the failure event to provide diagnostic information on the reason of failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数可能包含在故障事件中，以提供故障原因的诊断信息。

contents.text: quality alert EventID: qualert, 0x0006
contents.zh-CHS: 质量警报事件ID:qualert，0x0006

contents.text: This property allows the MG to indicate a loss of quality of the network connection. The MG may do this by measuring packet loss, interarrival jitter, propagation delay and then indicating this using a percentage of quality loss.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性允许MG指示网络连接的质量损失。MG可以通过测量分组丢失、到达间抖动、传播延迟，然后使用质量损失百分比来指示这一点来做到这一点。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数

contents.text: Threshold ParameterId: th (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 阈值参数ID:th（0x0001）

contents.text: Type: integer
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：整数

contents.text: Possible values: 0 to 99
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：0到99

contents.text: Description: threshold for percent of quality loss measured, calculated based on a provisioned method, that could take into consideration packet loss, jitter, and delay for example. Event is triggered when calculation exceeds the threshold.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：测量的质量损失百分比阈值，根据规定的方法计算，可考虑数据包丢失、抖动和延迟等因素。当计算超过阈值时触发事件。

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数

contents.text: Threshold ParameterId: th (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 阈值参数ID:th（0x0001）

contents.text: Type: integer
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：整数

contents.text: Possible values: 0 to 99
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：0到99

contents.text: Description: percent of quality loss measured, calculated based on a provisioned method, that could take into consideration packet loss, jitter, and delay for example.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：测量的质量损失百分比，根据规定的方法计算，可考虑数据包丢失、抖动和延迟等因素。

None.

contents.zh-CHS: 持续时间统计ID:dur（0x0001）

contents.text: Description: provides duration of time the termination has been in the Context.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：提供终止在上下文中的持续时间。

contents.text: Type: double, in milliseconds
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双精度，以毫秒为单位

contents.text: Octets Sent StatisticID: os (0x0002)
contents.zh-CHS: 发送的八位字节统计：os（0x0002）

contents.text: Type: double
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双

contents.text: Possible values: any 64-bit integer
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：任意64位整数

contents.text: Octets Received StatisticID: or (0x0003)
contents.zh-CHS: 统计接收的八位字节：or（0x0003）

contents.text: Type: double
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双

contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：任意64位整数

contents.text: E.12 RTP Package
contents.zh-CHS: E.12 RTP包

contents.text: PackageID: rtp (0x000c) Version: 1 Extends: Network Package version 1
contents.zh-CHS: PackageID:rtp（0x000c）版本：1扩展：网络包版本1

contents.text: This package is used to support packet-based multimedia data transfer by means of the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) [RFC 1889].
contents.zh-CHS: 该包用于通过实时传输协议（RTP）[RFC 1889]支持基于包的多媒体数据传输。

contents.text: E.12.1 Properties
None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.12.2 Events
Payload Transition EventID: pltrans, 0x0001
contents.zh-CHS: 有效负载转换事件ID:pltrans，0x0001

contents.text: This event detects and notifies when there is a transition of the RTP payload format from one format to another.
contents.zh-CHS: 当RTP有效负载格式从一种格式转换为另一种格式时，此事件检测并通知。

contents.text: EventDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: EventDescriptor参数

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: ObservedEventsDescriptor parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ObservedEventsDescriptor参数

contents.text: ParameterName: rtppayload ParameterID: rtppltype, 0x01
contents.zh-CHS: 参数名称：rtppayload参数ID:rtppltype，0x01

contents.text: Type: list of enumerated types.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：枚举类型的列表。

contents.text: Possible values: The encoding method shall be specified by using one or several valid encoding names, as defined in the RTP AV Profile or registered with IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：编码方法应使用RTP AV配置文件中定义的或IANA注册的一个或多个有效编码名称来指定。

contents.text: E.12.3 Signals
None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.12.4 Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: E.12.4 统计数字

contents.text: Packets Sent StatisticID: ps (0x0004)
contents.zh-CHS: 统计发送的数据包：ps（0x0004）

contents.text: Type: double
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双

contents.text: Possible values: any 64-bit integer
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：任意64位整数

contents.text: Packets Received StatisticID: pr (0x0005)
contents.zh-CHS: 统计接收的数据包：pr（0x0005）

contents.text: Type: double
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双

contents.text: Possible values: any 64-bit integer
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：任意64位整数

contents.text: Packet Loss StatisticID: pl (0x0006)
contents.zh-CHS: 分组丢失统计：pl（0x0006）

contents.text: Describes the current rate of packet loss on an RTP stream, as defined in IETF RFC 1889. Packet loss is expressed as percentage value: number of packets lost in the interval between two reception reports, divided by the number of packets expected during that interval.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述RTP流上的当前数据包丢失率，如IETF RFC 1889中所定义。数据包丢失表示为百分比值：两个接收报告之间间隔内丢失的数据包数除以该间隔内预期的数据包数。

contents.text: Type: double
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：双

contents.text: Possible values: a 32-bit whole number and a 32-bit fraction.
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：32位整数和32位小数。

contents.text: Jitter StatisticID: jit (0x0007)
contents.zh-CHS: 抖动统计：jit（0x0007）

contents.text: Requests the current value of the interarrival jitter on an RTP stream as defined in IETF RFC 1889. Jitter measures the variation in interarrival time for RTP data packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求IETF RFC 1889中定义的RTP流上的到达间隔抖动的当前值。抖动测量RTP数据包到达间隔时间的变化。

contents.text: Delay StatisticID:delay (0x0008)
contents.zh-CHS: 延迟统计：延迟（0x0008）

contents.text: Requests the current value of packet propagation delay expressed in timestamp units. Same as average latency.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求以时间戳单位表示的数据包传播延迟的当前值。与平均延迟相同。

contents.text: E.12.5 Procedures
None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: E.13 TDM Circuit Package
contents.zh-CHS: E.13 TDM电路包

contents.text: PackageID: tdmc (0x000d) Version: 1 Extends: Network Package version 1
contents.zh-CHS: PackageID:tdmc（0x000d）版本：1扩展：网络包版本1

contents.text: This package may be used by any termination that supports gain and echo control. It was originally intended for use on TDM circuits but may be more widely used.
contents.zh-CHS: 该封装可用于支持增益和回波控制的任何终端。它最初打算用于TDM电路，但可能会得到更广泛的应用。

contents.text: New versions or extensions of this package should take non-TDM use into account.
contents.zh-CHS: 此软件包的新版本或扩展应考虑非TDM使用。

contents.zh-CHS: 回声消除属性ID:ec（0x0008）

contents.text: Possible values:

contents.zh-CHS: “关闭”（关闭时）

contents.zh-CHS: 默认设置已设置。

contents.zh-CHS: 在中定义：LocalControlDescriptor

contents.text: Characteristics: read/write
contents.zh-CHS: 特征：读/写

contents.text: Gain Control PropertyID: gain (0x000a)
contents.zh-CHS: 增益控制属性ID：增益（0x000a）

contents.text: Gain control, or usage of of signal level adaptation and noise level reduction is used to adapt the level of the signal. However, it is necessary, for example for modem calls, to turn off this function.
contents.zh-CHS: 增益控制，或使用信号电平自适应和噪声电平降低来自适应信号电平。但是，必须关闭此功能，例如，对于调制解调器呼叫。

contents.text: Type: integer
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：整数

contents.text: Possible values:
contents.zh-CHS: 可能值：

contents.text: The gain control parameter may either be specified as "automatic" (0xffffffff), or as an explicit number of decibels of gain (any other integer value). The default is provisioned in the MG.
contents.zh-CHS: 增益控制参数可以指定为“自动”（0xffffffff），也可以指定为增益分贝的明确数字（任何其他整数值）。默认值在MG中设置。

contents.zh-CHS: 在中定义：LocalControlDescriptor

contents.zh-CHS: 特征：读/写

contents.text: APPENDIX I EXAMPLE CALL FLOWS (INFORMATIVE)
contents.zh-CHS: 附录I示例调用流（资料性）

contents.text: All H.248.1 implementors must read the normative part of this RFC carefully before implementing from it. The examples in this appendix should not be used as stand-alone explanations of how to create protocol messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有H.248.1实施者在实施之前必须仔细阅读本RFC的规范部分。本附录中的示例不应作为如何创建协议消息的独立解释。

contents.text: The examples in this appendix use SDP for encoding of the Local and and Remote stream descriptors. SDP is defined in RFC 2327. If there is is any discrepancy between the SDP in the examples, and RFC 2327, the the RFC should be consulted for correctness. Audio profiles used are are those defined in IETF RFC 1890, and others registered with IANA. For example, G.711 A-law is called PCMA in SDP, and is assigned profile 0. G.723.1 is called G723 and is profile 4; H.263 is called H263 and is profile 34. See also http://www.iana.org/assignments/rtp-parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 本附录中的示例使用SDP对本地和远程流描述符进行编码。SDP在RFC 2327中定义。如果示例中的SDP与RFC 2327之间存在任何差异，应咨询RFC以确定其正确性。使用的音频配置文件是IETF RFC 1890中定义的配置文件，以及IANA注册的其他配置文件。例如，G.711 A-law在SDP中称为PCMA，并被分配为配置文件0。G.723.1称为G723，为剖面图4；H.263称为H263，为剖面图34。另见http://www.iana.org/assignments/rtp-parameters.

contents.text: A.1 Residential Gateway to Residential Gateway Call
contents.zh-CHS: A.1住宅网关到住宅网关呼叫

contents.text: This example scenario illustrates the use of the elements of the protocol to set up a Residential Gateway to Residential Gateway call over an IP-based network. For simplicity, this example assumes that both Residential Gateways involved in the call are controlled by the same Media Gateway Controller.
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例场景演示了如何使用协议元素通过基于IP的网络建立住宅网关到住宅网关的呼叫。为简单起见，本示例假设呼叫中涉及的两个住宅网关均由同一媒体网关控制器控制。

contents.text: A.1.1 Programming Residential GW Analog Line Terminations for Idle Behavior
contents.zh-CHS: A.1.1 为空闲行为编程住宅GW模拟线路终端

contents.text: The following illustrates the API invocations from the Media Gateway Controller and Media Gateways to get the Terminations in this scenario programmed for idle behavior. Both the originating and terminating Media Gateways have idle AnalogLine Terminations programmed to look for call initiation events (i.e., -offhook) by using the Modify Command with the appropriate parameters. The null Context is used to indicate that the Terminations are not yet involved in a Context. The ROOT termination is used to indicate the entire MG instead of a termination within the MG.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下说明了媒体网关控制器和媒体网关的API调用，以便在此场景中为空闲行为编程终止。发起和终止媒体网关都有空闲模拟线终端，通过使用带有适当参数的Modify命令，对其进行编程，以查找呼叫启动事件（即-offhook）。空上下文用于指示上下文中尚未涉及终止。根终端用于指示整个MG，而不是MG内的终端。

contents.text: In this example, MG1 has the IP address 124.124.124.222, MG2 is 125.125.125.111, and the MGC is 123.123.123.4. The default Megaco port is 55555 for all three.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此示例中，MG1的IP地址为124.124.124.222，MG2的IP地址为125.125.125.111，MGC的IP地址为123.123.123.4。这三个端口的默认Megaco端口均为55555。

contents.text: 1. An MG registers with an MGC using the ServiceChange command:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. MG使用ServiceChange命令向MGC注册：

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text:
MEGACO/1 [124.124.124.222] Transaction = 9998 {
    Context = - {
2. The MGC sends a reply:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. MGC发送回复：

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: 3. The MGC programs a Termination in the NULL context. The terminationId is A4444, the streamId is 1, the requestId in the Events descriptor is 2222. The mId is the identifier of the sender of this message, in this case, it is the IP address and port [123.123.123.4]:55555. Mode for this stream is set to SendReceive. "al" is the analog line supervision package. Local and Remote are assumed to be provisioned.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. MGC在空上下文中编程终止。terminationId为A4444，streamId为1，事件描述符中的requestId为2222。mId是该消息发送者的标识符，在本例中，它是IP地址和端口[123.123.123.4]：55555。此流的模式设置为SendReceive。“al”是模拟线路监控包。假设本地和远程都已配置。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: The dialplan script could have been loaded into the MG previously. Its function would be to wait for the OffHook, turn on dialtone and start collecting DTMF digits. However in this example, we use the digit map, which is put into place after the offhook is detected (step 5 below).
contents.zh-CHS: dialplan脚本以前可能已加载到MG中。它的功能是等待摘机，打开拨号音并开始收集DTMF数字。然而，在本例中，我们使用数字映射，它是在检测到摘机后放置到位的（下面的步骤5）。

contents.text: Note that the embedded EventsDescriptor could have been used to combine steps 3 and 4 with steps 8 and 9, eliminating steps 6 and 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，嵌入式EventsDescriptor可用于将步骤3和4与步骤8和9结合起来，从而消除步骤6和7。

contents.text: 4. The MG1 accepts the Modify with this reply:
contents.zh-CHS: 4. MG1通过以下回复接受修改：

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text:
Reply = 9999 {
   Context = - {Modify = A4444} }
5. A similar exchange happens between MG2 and the MGC, resulting in an idle Termination called A5555.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. MG2和MGC之间发生类似的交换，导致称为A5555的空闲终端。

contents.text: A.1.2 Collecting Originator Digits and Initiating Termination
contents.zh-CHS: A.1.2 收集发起人数字并发起终止

contents.text: The following builds upon the previously shown conditions. It illustrates the transactions from the Media Gateway Controller and originating Media Gateway (MG1) to get the originating Termination (A4444) through the stages of digit collection required to initiate a connection to the terminating Media Gateway (MG2).
contents.zh-CHS: 以下内容以前面显示的条件为基础。它说明了来自媒体网关控制器和始发媒体网关（MG1）的事务，以使始发终端（A4444）通过启动与终端媒体网关（MG2）的连接所需的数字收集阶段。

contents.text: 6. MG1 detects an offhook event from User 1 and reports it to the Media Gateway Controller via the Notify Command.
contents.zh-CHS: 6. MG1检测到来自用户1的摘机事件，并通过Notify命令将其报告给媒体网关控制器。

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text: 7. And the Notify is acknowledged.
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 通知已确认。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: Context = - {Notify = A4444} }
8. The MGC Modifies the termination to play dial tone, to look for digits according to Dialplan0 and to look for the on-hook event now.
contents.zh-CHS: 8. MGC修改终端以播放拨号音，根据Dialplan0查找数字，并立即查找挂机事件。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: 9. And the Modify is acknowledged.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 并确认修改。

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text: 10. Next, digits are accumulated by MG1 as they are dialed by User 1. Dialtone is stopped upon detection of the first digit. When an appropriate match is made of collected digits against the currently programmed Dialplan for A4444, another Notify is sent to the Media Gateway Controller.
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 接下来，MG1在用户1拨号时累积数字。当检测到第一个数字时，拨号音停止。当收集的数字与A4444当前编程的拨号计划进行适当匹配时，会向媒体网关控制器发送另一个通知。

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text: 11. And the Notify is acknowledged.
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 通知已确认。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: 12. The controller then analyses the digits and determines that a connection needs to be made from MG1 to MG2. Both the TDM
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 然后，控制器分析这些数字并确定需要从MG1连接到MG2。TDM和

contents.text: termination A4444, and an RTP termination are added to a new context in MG1. Mode is ReceiveOnly since Remote descriptor values are not yet specified. Preferred codecs are in the MGC's preferred order of choice.
contents.zh-CHS: 终端A4444和RTP终端被添加到MG1中的新上下文中。由于尚未指定远程描述符值，因此仅接收模式。首选编解码器按照MGC的首选顺序选择。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: NOTE - The MGC states its preferred parameter values as a series of SDP blocks in Local. The MG fills in the Local Descriptor in the Reply.
contents.zh-CHS: 注-MGC将其首选参数值表示为本地的一系列SDP块。MG在应答中填充本地描述符。

contents.text: 13. MG1 acknowledges the new Termination and fills in the Local IP address and UDP port. It also makes a choice for the codec based on the MGC preferences in Local. MG1 sets the RTP port to 2222.
contents.zh-CHS: 13. MG1确认新的终止，并填写本地IP地址和UDP端口。它还根据本地的MGC首选项选择编解码器。MG1将RTP端口设置为2222。

contents.text: MG1 -> MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1->MGC：

contents.text: 14. The MGC will now associate A5555 with a new Context on MG2, and establish an RTP Stream (i.e., A5556 will be assigned), SendReceive connection through to the originating user, User 1. The MGC also sets ring on A5555.
contents.zh-CHS: 14. MGC现在将A5555与MG2上的新上下文相关联，并建立RTP流（即，将分配A5556），发送接收连接到发起用户user 1。MGC还在A5555上设置环。

contents.text: MGC to MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG2：

contents.text: 15. This is acknowledged. The stream port number is different from the control port number. In this case it is 1111 (in the SDP).
contents.zh-CHS: 15. 这是公认的。流端口号与控制端口号不同。在这种情况下，它是1111（在SDP中）。

contents.text: MG2 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG2至MGC：

contents.text: 16. The above IPAddr and UDPport need to be given to MG1 now.
contents.zh-CHS: 16. 以上IPAddr和UDPport需要立即提供给MG1。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG1至MGC：

contents.text: 17. The two gateways are now connected and User 1 hears the RingBack. The MG2 now waits until User2 picks up the receiver and then the two-way call is established.
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 两个网关现在已连接，用户1将听到回音。MG2现在等待，直到User2拿起接收器，然后建立双向呼叫。

contents.text: From MG2 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MG2到MGC：

contents.text: From MGC to MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MGC到MG2：

contents.text: From MGC to MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MGC到MG2：

contents.text: From MG2 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MG2到MGC：

contents.text: 18. Change mode on MG1 to SendReceive, and stop the ringback.
contents.zh-CHS: 18. 将MG1上的模式更改为SendReceive，并停止回铃。

contents.text: MGC to MG1:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC至MG1：

contents.text: from MG1 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MG1到MGC：

contents.text: 19. The MGC decides to Audit the RTP termination on MG2.
contents.zh-CHS: 19. MGC决定审核MG2上的RTP终止。

contents.text: MGC -> MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: MGC->MG2：

contents.text: 20. The MG2 replies.
contents.zh-CHS: 20. MG2回答道。

contents.text: MG2 -> MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: MG2->MGC：

contents.text:
MEGACO/1 [125.125.125.111]:55555 Reply = 50007 {
   Context = - { AuditValue = A5556 {
          Media {
             TerminationState { ServiceStates = InService,
         Buffer = OFF },
       Stream = 1 {
                 LocalControl { Mode = SendReceive,
                    nt/jit=40 },
                 Local { v=0 o=- 7736844526 7736842807 IN IP4
125.125.125.111 s=- t= 0 0 c=IN IP4 125.125.125.111 m=audio 1111
RTP/AVP  4 a=ptime:30
                },
                 Remote { v=0 o=- 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4
124.124.124.222 s=- t= 0 0 c=IN IP4 124.124.124.222 m=audio 2222
RTP/AVP  4 a=ptime:30
                 } } },
           Events,
        Signals,
        DigitMap,
       Packages {nt-1, rtp-1},
          Statistics { rtp/ps=1200,  ; packets sent
                       nt/os=62300, ; octets sent
                       rtp/pr=700, ; packets received
                       nt/or=45100, ; octets received
                       rtp/pl=0.2,  ; % packet loss
                       rtp/jit=20,
                       rtp/delay=40 } ; avg latency
       }
21. When the MGC receives an onhook signal from one of the MGs, it brings down the call. In this example, the user at MG2 hangs up first.
contents.zh-CHS: 21. 当MGC接收到来自其中一个MG的挂接信号时，它关闭呼叫。在本例中，MG2的用户首先挂断。

contents.text: From MG2 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MG2到MGC：

contents.text: From MGC to MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MGC到MG2：

contents.text: Context = - {Notify = A5555} }

22. The MGC now sends both MGs a Subtract to take down the call. Only the subtracts to MG2 are shown here. Each termination has its own set of statistics that it gathers. An MGC may not need to request both to be returned. A5555 is a physical termination, and A5556 is an RTP termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 22. MGC现在向两个MG发送一个减法以记下呼叫。此处仅显示MG2的减法。每个终端都有自己收集的统计数据集。MGC可能不需要同时请求返回这两个文件。A5555是物理终端，A5556是RTP终端。

contents.text: From MGC to MG2:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MGC到MG2：

contents.text: From MG2 to MGC:
contents.zh-CHS: 从MG2到MGC：

contents.text: 23. The MGC now sets up both MG1 and MG2 to be ready to detect the next off-hook event. See step 1. Note that this could be the default state of a termination in the null context, and if this were the case, no message need be sent from the MGC to the MG. Once a termination returns to the null context, it goes back to the default termination values for that termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 23. MGC现在将MG1和MG2都设置为准备检测下一个脱钩事件。见第1步。注意，这可能是null上下文中终止的默认状态，如果是这种情况，则不需要从MGC向MG发送消息。一旦终止返回空上下文，它将返回该终止的默认终止值。

contents.text: APPENDIX II Changes From RFC 3015
contents.zh-CHS: 附录II RFC 3015的变更

contents.text: In the following table, "source" indicates when the change was first approved. It has the following values:
contents.zh-CHS: 下表中，“来源”表示变更首次批准的时间。它具有以下值：

contents.text: IG1100: H.248 Implementor's Guide approved in November, 2000 (as TD Plen-39, Christian Groves, editor).

contents.text: IG0601: H.248 Implementor's Guide approved in June, 2001 (as TD Plen-15, Christian Groves, editor).
contents.zh-CHS: IG0601:H.248实施者指南于2001年6月批准（作为TD Plen-15，Christian Groves，编辑）。

contents.text: IGDUB: Draft H.248 Implementor's Guide approved at the Q.3 Rapporteur's meeting held near Dublin, October 2001 (as TD-28, Terry Anderson, editor).
contents.zh-CHS: IGDUB:2001年10月在都柏林附近举行的Q.3报告员会议上批准的H.248实施者指南草案（作为TD-28，Terry Anderson，编辑）。

contents.text: GEN0202: added at the Geneva meeting, February 2002, which consented to H.248 v1 Amendment 1 (as TD Plen-36r1, Marcello Pantaleo, editor).

contents.text: Section Source Change

contents.text: 1 ITUPOST Reference changed from H.248 to H.248.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 1 ITUPPOST参考从H.248更改为H.248.1。

contents.text: 2.1 ITUPOST Reference added for error codes, changed from H.248 Annex L to H.248.8 (2002).
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1 为错误代码添加了ITUPPOST参考，从H.248附录L更改为H.248.8（2002）。

contents.text: 2.1 IG1100 Corrected Q.765 reference to Q.765.5.
2.1 GEN0202 Added reference to X.690.
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1 GEN0202增加了对X.690的引用。

contents.text: 2.2 GEN0202 Added reference to H.226.
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2 GEN0202增加了对H.226的引用。

contents.text: 2.2 IGDUB Added informative references to Q.724, Q.764, and Q.1902.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2 IGDUB增加了Q.724、Q.764和Q.1902.4的参考资料。

contents.text: 4 IG0601 Added expansion of ALF.
contents.zh-CHS: 4 IG0601增加了ALF的扩展。

contents.text: 5 TTPOST Gave priority to IETF conventions (added at start of document).
contents.zh-CHS: TTPOST优先考虑IETF公约（在文件开头添加）。

contents.text: 6.1.1 IG0601 Added text regarding use of wildcards for context identifiers. (This information already appeared in section 8.1.2. The IG change subsequently disappeared.)
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.1 IG0601添加了关于上下文标识符使用通配符的文本。（该信息已出现在第8.1.2节中。IG变更随后消失。）

contents.text: 6.1.1 IG1100 Added ranking of priority values.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.1 IG1100增加了优先级值的排序。

contents.text: 6.2 IGDUB Deleted definition of signals.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 IGDUB删除了信号的定义。

contents.text: 6.2 GEN0202 Expanded text and diagrams describing multiplexing terminations.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 GEN0202描述多路复用终端的扩展文本和图表。

contents.text: 6.2 TTPOST Added asterisks to multiplexing diagrams to indicate centre of context. Added Figure 6a showing cascading of multiplexes.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 TTPOST在多路复用图中添加了星号，以表示上下文的中心。增加图6a，显示多路复用的级联。

contents.text: 6.2.2 IG0601 Added text indicating that ALL does not include ROOT.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.2 IG0601添加了文本，指示所有不包括根。

contents.text: 6.2.3 IG1100 Added text clarifying what must be supported to claim support of a package.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.3 IG1100增加了文本，阐明了声称支持软件包必须支持的内容。

contents.text: 6.2.3 IG1100 Added text indicating what packages a peer can indicate support for, when some of them are extensions of others.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.3 IG1100添加了文本，指示对等方可以表示支持哪些包，其中一些包是其他包的扩展。

contents.text: 6.2.4 IG0601 Added text on ability of provisioning to override default values, and need for MGC to audit to learn the provisioned defaults.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4 IG0601添加了关于设置覆盖默认值的能力的文本，并且需要MGC审核以了解设置的默认值。

contents.text: 6.2.4 IG0601 Added text indicating effect of omitting specific properties from Descriptors in commands modifying a termination. Contradicted original text saying that omitted properties retain their prior values (still true for entirely-omitted Descriptors).
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4 IG0601添加了文本，指示在修改终止的命令中从描述符中省略特定属性的效果。与原文相矛盾的是，省略的属性保留其先前的值（对于完全省略的描述符仍然如此）。

contents.text: 6.2.4 GEN0202 Modified above text to restrict it to read/write properties, allow for default behaviour in place of default values if so specified in the property definition.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4 GEN0202修改了上述文本，将其限制为读/写属性，如果在属性定义中指定，则允许默认行为代替默认值。

contents.text: 6.2.4 IGDUB Trimmed definition of signals Descriptor in table and inserted cross-reference to section 7.1.11.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4 IGDUB在表中对信号描述符的定义进行了修整，并插入了第7.1.11节的交叉引用。

contents.text: 6.2.4 IG1100 Added Topology and Error Descriptors to table.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4 IG1100向表中添加了拓扑和错误描述符。

contents.text: 6.2.5 IGDUB Specified error code to return if ROOT used inappropriately.
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.5 IGDUB指定了在根目录使用不当时返回的错误代码。

contents.text: 7.1.1 IG1100 Added qualification to explanation of effect of missing Audit Descriptor, excepting Subtract.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.1 IG1100在解释缺失审计描述符的影响时增加了限定条件，但减去除外。

contents.text: 7.1.3 GEN0202 Changed "inputs" to "bearers" to be consistent with terminology in 6.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.3 GEN0202将“输入”更改为“承载器”，以符合6.2中的术语。

contents.text: 7.1.4 IG0601 Small change to make clear that more than one of Local, Remote, and LocalControl can be included in the default streamId.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.4 IG0601做了一个小改动，以明确默认streamId中可以包含多个Local、Remote和LocalControl。

contents.text: 7.1.7 IG0601 Default value for Mode specified to be Inactive.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.7 IG0601指定为非活动模式的默认值。

contents.text: 7.1.7 GEN0202 Added text requiring processing of media in any of the reserved formats, where more than one has been reserved in a given stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.7 GEN0202添加了需要以任何保留格式处理媒体的文本，其中给定流中保留了多个保留格式。

contents.text: 7.1.8 IGDUB Added restriction to at most one m= line per session description.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.8 IGDUB增加了对每个会话描述最多一行m=的限制。

contents.text: 7.1.9 IG0601 Text added to omit request identifier if the EventsDescriptor is empty. Further text added at end to indicate the effects of an empty EventsDescriptor and an empty EventBufferDescriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.9 如果EventsDescriptor为空，则添加IG0601文本以忽略请求标识符。在末尾添加进一步的文本，以指示空EventsDescriptor和空EventBufferDescriptor的效果。

contents.text: 7.1.9 IG0601 Fixed typo for destination of a Notify.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.9 IG0601修复了通知目的地的打字错误。

contents.text: 7.1.9 IG1100 Added note to say event remains active after it has been notified, so long as it is still present in the active Events Descriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.9 IG1100增加了一条注释，说明事件在收到通知后仍然处于活动状态，只要它仍然存在于活动事件描述符中。

contents.text: 7.1.11 IGDUB Added definition of signals.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.11 IGDUB增加了信号的定义。

contents.text: 7.1.11 GEN0202 Modified definition to include example of more complex signal, and added role of signal in media preparation for future signals.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.11 GEN0202修改了定义，以包括更复杂信号的示例，并增加了信号在未来信号介质准备中的作用。

contents.text: 7.1.11 IGDUB The timeout completion reason was broadened to include other circumstances where the signal completed on its own. Text added to indicate that if default signal type changed to TO, duration parameter must be provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.11 IGDUB超时完成原因被扩大，以包括信号自行完成的其他情况。添加的文本表示如果默认信号类型更改为，则必须提供持续时间参数。

contents.text: 7.1.11 GEN0202 Removed reference to BR signal being "so short" it will stop on its own. Added text indicating that if the type of a signal is changed to TO, the Duration parameter must be supplied.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.11 GEN0202删除了BR信号“太短”的参考，它将自行停止。添加文本，指示如果信号类型更改为，则必须提供持续时间参数。

contents.text: 7.1.11 IG1100 Deleted text discussing type of Signals List.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.11 IG1100删除了讨论信号类型列表的文本。

contents.text: 7.1.12 GEN0202 Improved wording of introductory paragraph and added text making content of returned Descriptor clear.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.12 GEN0202改进了介绍性段落的措辞，并添加了文本，使返回的描述符内容清晰。

contents.text: 7.1.14.2 GEN0202 Added text indicating that when the start timer is set to 0, initial digit timing is disabled and the MG waits indefinitely for digits.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.2 GEN0202添加了文本，指示当启动计时器设置为0时，初始数字计时被禁用，MG无限期地等待数字。

contents.text: 7.1.14.2 GEN0202 Added text pointing out that default digit timer values should be provisioned, but can be overridden in the digit map.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.2 GEN0202添加了文本，指出应该设置默认的数字计时器值，但可以在数字映射中重写。

contents.text: 7.1.14.3 GEN0202 Changed result of long-short digit timer conflict from undefined to long.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.3 GEN0202将长短位计时器冲突的结果从未定义更改为长。

contents.text: 7.1.14.6 IG1100 Clarified that the digit map is provided by the eventDM parameter, which must be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.6 IG1100阐明数字映射由eventDM参数提供，该参数必须存在。

contents.text: 7.1.14.7 GEN0202 Added text clarifying that events covered by the digit map completion event have no side-effects unless separately enabled.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.7 GEN0202添加了文本，澄清数字映射完成事件所涵盖的事件没有副作用，除非单独启用。

contents.text: 7.1.14.8 IG0601 Added requirement that the event specification include the eventDM parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.14.8 IG0601增加了事件规范包括eventDM参数的要求。

contents.text: 7.1.17 IGDUB Added text to indicate timestamp is optional and to include observed event parameters in reported content.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.17 IGDUB添加了文本，以指示时间戳是可选的，并在报告内容中包含观察到的事件参数。

contents.text: 7.1.17 GEN0202 Deleted provision that time is expressed in UTC (since intention was to use format, not time zone).
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.17 GEN0202删除了时间以UTC表示的规定（因为目的是使用格式，而不是时区）。

contents.text: 7.1.18 IGDUB Added text indicating error to return if topology option not supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.18 IGDUB添加了文本，指示不支持拓扑选项时返回的错误。

contents.text: 7.1.18 IG1100 Added text clarifying effect of not mentioning TTPOST a termination in a topology Descriptor, and default topology for a new termination. (This text got lost between the Dublin meeting and the production of H.248 Amendment 1 out of the Geneva 02/02 meeting. It has been added back to the present document.)
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.18 IG1100增加了文本，阐明了在拓扑描述符中不提及TTPOST终端的效果，以及新终端的默认拓扑。（该文本在都柏林会议和日内瓦02/02会议产生的H.248修正案1之间丢失。该文本已添加回本文件。）

contents.text: 7.1.19 IG1100 New section to describe Error Descriptor. GEN0202 Slightly edited in Geneva 02/02 meeting. ITUPOST Reference for error code documentation updated to H.248.8.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.19 IG1100新增一节描述错误描述符。GEN0202在日内瓦02/02会议上稍作编辑。更新至H.248.8的错误代码文档的ITUPOST参考。

contents.text: 7.1.19 IG0601 Added paragraph giving guidance on level at which errors should be reported.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1.19 IG0601增加了一段，给出了错误报告级别的指导。

contents.text: 7.2 IG1100 Noted possibility of Error Descriptor in reply to any command.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2 IG1100注意到响应任何命令时可能出现错误描述符。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.1 IG1100添加了EventBufferDescriptor作为添加参数。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.1 IG1100取消了对使用CHOOSE通配符的限制。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.2 IG1100添加了EventBufferDescriptor作为修改参数。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.2 GEN0202添加了关于修改多路复用终端的副作用的文本。

contents.text: 7.2.3 IG1100 Added prohibition against subtracting from the NULL context.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3 IG1100增加了禁止从空上下文中进行减法的功能。

contents.text: 7.2.3 GEN0202 Added text on side-effects of Subtract of a multiplexing termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3 GEN0202添加了关于多路复用终端减法的副作用的文本。

contents.text: 7.2.3 IGDUB Added text clarifying effect of empty AuditDescriptor in Subtract.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3 IGDUB在减法中添加了澄清空AuditDescriptor效果的文本。

contents.text: 7.2.4 IG1100 Added EventBufferDescriptor as Move parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4 IG1100添加了EventBufferDescriptor作为移动参数。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4 GEN0202删除了Move充当原始上下文减法运算的误导性语句。

contents.text: 7.2.4 IG1100 Clarified effect of Move on properties of the moved termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4 IG1100阐明了移动对移动终端属性的影响。

contents.text: 7.2.4 GEN0202 Added text on side-effects of Move of a multiplexing termination.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4 GEN0202添加了关于移动多路复用终端的副作用的文本。

contents.text: 7.2.5 IG1100 Added examples showing W- wildcard usage.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.5 IG1100增加了显示W-通配符用法的示例。

contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.5 IG1100指出，返回所有ContextID的列表要求每个ActionReply返回一个ContextID。

contents.text: 7.2.5 IG1100 Added table entry (ALL, specific) to determine context in which termination currently resides.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.5 IG1100添加了表项（全部，特定），以确定终止当前所在的上下文。

contents.text: 7.2.6 GEN0202 Added table similar to that in 7.2.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.6 GEN0202增加了与7.2.5类似的表格。

contents.text: 7.2.7 IG0601 Added TerminationID to API.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.7 IG0601将TerminationID添加到API中。

contents.text: 7.2.7 IGDUB Indicated timestamp was optional in Notify, to accord with syntax.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.7 IGDUB指出时间戳在Notify中是可选的，以符合语法。

contents.text: 7.2.7 IG1100 Noted possibility of sending Error Descriptor in Notify.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.7 IG1100注意到在Notify中发送错误描述符的可能性。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IG0601 Added text to description of Forced method to indicate that Forced on ROOT indicates a cold restart (all context state lost).
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 IG0601在强制方法的描述中添加了文本，以指示根目录上的强制表示冷重启（所有上下文状态丢失）。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IGDUB Amplified explanation of Disconnected method to emphasize return to the previously controlling MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 IGDUB详细解释了断开连接的方法，强调返回到先前控制的MGC。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IG0601 Added text for MG use of Failover method when it detects MGC failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 IG0601添加了MG在检测到MGC故障时使用故障转移方法的文本。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IG1100 Added notes discouraging use of ServiceChangeAddress and warning that it could be either a full address or just a port number.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 IG1100增加了不鼓励使用ServiceChangeAddress的注释，并警告它可能是完整地址，也可能只是端口号。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IG0601 Added text indicating that timestamp does not necessarily represent absolute time, only local clock reading.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 IG0601添加了文本，指示时间戳不一定表示绝对时间，只表示本地时钟读取。

contents.text: 7.2.8 IGDUB Corrected "gateway" to "MGC" in discussion of returned ServiceChangeMgcId parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.8 在讨论返回的ServiceChangeMgcId参数时，IGDUB将“网关”更正为“MGC”。

contents.text: 7.3 IG0601 Removed error code documentation to Annex L ITUPOST (now H.248.8).
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3 IG0601删除了附录L ITUPPOST中的错误代码文档（现为H.248.8）。

contents.text: 8 IG1100 Added requirement that an Action be non-empty.
contents.zh-CHS: 8 IG1100增加了动作必须非空的要求。

contents.text: 8 GEN0202 Added context properties and context property audit requests to commands as potential contents of actions.
contents.zh-CHS: 8 GEN0202将上下文属性和上下文属性审核请求作为操作的潜在内容添加到命令中。

contents.text: 8.1.2 GEN0202 Added prohibition on using partial contextIDs with ALL wildcards.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.2 GEN0202增加了对所有通配符使用部分上下文ID的禁止。

contents.text: 8.2.2 IG1100 Added text clarifying when in transaction processing the requested actions have been completed and a reply can be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2 IG1100添加了文本，说明在事务处理过程中，何时完成请求的操作并可以发送回复。

contents.text: 8.2.2 IG1100 Added ALL as allowed contextID in TransactionReply.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2 IG1100在TransactionReply中添加了所有允许的contextID。

contents.text: 8.2.2 GEN0202 Provided general reference to section 7.1.19 for generation of error Descriptors.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2 GEN0202为错误描述符的生成提供了第7.1.19节的一般参考。

contents.text: 8.2.2 IG0601 Corrected Actions to Commands when discussing partially-understood action.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2 在讨论部分理解的操作时，IG0601纠正了命令的操作。

contents.text: 8.3 IG0601 Added text specifying that the same MId value must be used by a given entity throughout the life of a control association.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3 IG0601添加了文本，指定给定实体在控件关联的整个生命周期内必须使用相同的中间值。

contents.text: 8.3 IG0601 Added text expanding on independence of transactions from messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3 IG0601增加了关于事务独立于消息的文本扩展。

contents.text: 9 ITUPOST Indicated that additional transports may be defined in separate Recommendations as well as annexes to the primary specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 9 ITUPPOST指出，附加运输可在单独的建议以及主要规范的附件中定义。

contents.text: 9 IG0601 Gave specific example of "request source address" for IP.
contents.zh-CHS: 9 IG0601给出了IP的“请求源地址”的具体示例。

contents.text: 9.1 IG1100 Deleted restriction to one outstanding Notify command on a termination at one time, since this is transport-specific.
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1 IG1100删除了一次终止时一个未完成通知命令的限制，因为这是特定于传输的。

contents.text: 9.1 IG0601 Restored restriction, but noted that it applied only to transport not guaranteeing ordered delivery.
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1 IG0601恢复了限制，但指出它仅适用于不保证有序交货的运输。

contents.text: 10.2 IG1100 Corrected length of synthesized address field from 10 to 20 hex digits and indicated that calculation should be over entire message, not just one transaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2 IG1100将合成地址字段的长度从10到20个十六进制数字进行了更正，并指出计算应该覆盖整个消息，而不仅仅是一个事务。

contents.text: 11.2 IG1100 Corrected text in first two paragraphs describing use of ServiceChangeMgcId parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2 IG1100更正了描述ServiceChangeMgcId参数使用的前两段文字。

contents.text: 11.2 IG1100 Corrected "Transaction Accept" to "Transaction Reply".
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2 IG1100将“交易接受”更正为“交易回复”。

contents.text: 11.4 IG0601 Noted that support of redundant MGs requires GEN0202 use of a reliable transport and support in the MGC. Added more explanation in Geneva.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.4 IG0601指出，支持冗余MGs需要GEN0202在MGC中使用可靠的传输和支持。在日内瓦补充了更多的解释。

contents.text: 11.5 IG0601 Added text clarifying procedure if MG unable to establish a control relationship with any of its eligible MGCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5 IG0601增加了MG无法与其任何合格MGC建立控制关系时的文本澄清程序。

contents.text: 11.5 IGDUB Added text indicating that when trying to reestablish contact with the previously controlling MGC the MG uses the Disconnected method.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5 IGDUB添加的文本表明，当试图与先前控制的MGC重新建立联系时，MG使用断开连接的方法。

contents.text: 11.5 IG1100 Clarified handoff procedure.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5 IG1100阐明了切换程序。

contents.text: 11.5 GEN0202 Changed text on replies to transactions in progress during handoff. Replies now discarded when the service relationship with the old MGC has ended, rather than sent to the new MGC. The new MGC could still send replies to requests sent to the old MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5 GEN0202在切换期间更改了对正在进行的事务的回复文本。现在，当与旧MGC的服务关系结束时，将丢弃回复，而不是发送到新MGC。新的MGC仍然可以发送对发送给旧MGC的请求的回复。

contents.text: 12.1.1 GEN0202 Added optional package designation as "designed to be extended only".
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.1 GEN0202将可选包装名称添加为“仅设计用于扩展”。

contents.text: 12.1.1 IG1100 Made prohibition on overloading of identifiers in extended packages transitive through all ancestors of the extended package.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.1 IG1100禁止通过扩展包的所有祖先传递扩展包中的标识符过载。

contents.text: 12.1.2 IGDUB Clarified the set of types allowed for properties.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.2 IGDUB澄清了属性允许的类型集。

contents.text: 12.1.2 GEN0202 Added requirement to specify the base type of a sub-list.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.2 GEN0202增加了指定子列表基本类型的要求。

contents.text: 12.1.2 GEN0202 Provided requirements for content of the "Possible Values" template item, including specification of default values or behaviour.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.2 GEN0202提供了“可能值”模板项内容的要求，包括默认值或行为的规范。

contents.text: 12.1.4 GEN0202 Added requirement to specify the default signal type, and specify a default duration for TO signals. Also noted that duration is meaningless for BR, and that the signal type might be dependent on the values of other signal parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1.4 GEN0202增加了指定默认信号类型的要求，并指定to信号的默认持续时间。还注意到，持续时间对于BR没有意义，并且信号类型可能取决于其他信号参数的值。

contents.text: 12.2 GEN0202 Fixed section title (covers only event and signal parameters, not properties or statistics).
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 GEN0202固定章节标题（仅涵盖事件和信号参数，不包括属性或统计信息）。

contents.text: 12.2 IG1100 Reserved SPA and EPA prefixes, so they are not to be used for signal and event parameter tokens.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 IG1100保留SPA和EPA前缀，因此它们不用于信号和事件参数令牌。

contents.text: 12.2 IG0601 Expanded list of reserved prefixes.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 IG0601保留前缀的扩展列表。

contents.text: 12.2 IGDUB Clarified the set of types allowed for signal and event parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 IGDUB澄清了信号和事件参数允许的类型集。

contents.text: 12.2 GEN0202 Added requirement to specify the base type of a sub-list.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 GEN0202增加了指定子列表基本类型的要求。

contents.text: 12.2 GEN0202 Provided requirements for content of the "Possible Values" template item, including specification of default values or behaviour.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2 GEN0202提供了“可能值”模板项内容的要求，包括默认值或行为的规范。

contents.text: 12.4 IGDUB Corrected to indicate identifiers must start with alphabetic rather than alphanumeric character.
contents.zh-CHS: 12.4 更正为指示标识符的IGDUB必须以字母而不是字母数字字符开头。

contents.text: 13.1 IG0601 Changed private range of binary package identifiers to convenient hex values.
contents.zh-CHS: 13.1 IG0601将二进制包标识符的私有范围更改为方便的十六进制值。

contents.text: A GEN0202 Removed versions from X.680 and X.690 references.
contents.zh-CHS: GEN0202从X.680和X.690参考中删除了版本。

contents.text: A.2 IGDUB Added note warning that the syntax alone does not provide a complete description of the constraints, but must be supplemented by a reading of the text and comments.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IGDUB补充了一条警告，即语法本身并不能提供约束的完整描述，但必须通过阅读文本和注释进行补充。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Added description of double wrapping of parameters declared as OCTET STRING.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601增加了声明为八位字节字符串的参数的双重包装说明。

contents.text: A.2 GEN0202 Some editing of double wrapping description to use ASN.1, BER in their proper places. Added possibility of encoding strings as UTF8String, but only if they contain non-ASCII characters.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 GEN0202对双包装说明进行一些编辑，以便在适当的位置使用ASN.1、BER。增加了将字符串编码为UTF8String的可能性，但仅当它们包含非ASCII字符时。

contents.text: A.2 IGDUB Added line in table on double wrapping of true octet strings.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IGDUB在表中添加了关于真八位字节字符串双包装的行。

contents.text: A.2 IG1100 Corrected and expanded comments describing mtpAddress form of MId. Fixed maximum length of mtpAddress both here and in ServiceChangeAddress.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG1100更正并扩展了注释，说明此处和ServiceChangeAddress中mtpAddress的中间固定最大长度的mtpAddress形式。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Inserted missing lines in IP4Address production.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601在IP4Address生产中插入缺失的行。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Modified TransactionResponseAck to allow acknowledgement of multiple ranges of transactionIds.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601修改了TransactionResponseAK，允许确认多个TransactionID范围。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Corrected numerical value of CHOOSE as a context identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601更正了选择作为上下文标识符的数值。

contents.text: A.2 IGDUB Added missing extension marker in TopologyRequest.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IGDUB在TopologyRequest中添加了缺失的扩展标记。

contents.text: A.2 IG1100 AuditReply and AuditResult modified to bring binary functionality into line with text functionality.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2修改IG1100 AuditReply和AuditResult，使二进制功能与文本功能一致。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Removed OPTIONAL tag from terminationID in NotifyReply.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601从NotifyReply中的terminationID中删除了可选标记。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Added extraInfo substructure to EventParameter and SigParameter.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601在EventParameter和SigParameter中添加了extraInfo子结构。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Modified MediaDescriptor to make it optional to specify a stream.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601修改了MediaDescriptor，使其可以选择指定流。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Added OPTIONAL tags to reserveValue and reserveGroup.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601为reserveValue和reserveGroup添加了可选标记。

contents.text: A.2 IGDUB Added to comments for pkgdName to indicate applicability to event names, signal names, and statisticIds as well as property.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2在pkgdName的注释中添加IGDUB，以表明事件名称、信号名称、统计学家以及属性的适用性。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 RequestID made optional in EventsDescriptor and SecondEventsDescriptor and comment added saying it must be present if events are present.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601 RequestID在EventsDescriptor和SecondEventsDescriptor中为可选，并添加了注释，说明如果存在事件，则它必须存在。

contents.text: A.2 IG1100 Added OPTIONAL tags on RequestActions and SecondRequestedActions keepActive BOOLEANs.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG1100在RequestActions和SecondRequestedActions上添加了可选标记Keepacative BOOLEANs。

contents.text: A.2 IG1100 Added comment to indicate requestID value to use in an AuditCapReply.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG1100添加了注释，以指示在AuditCapReply中使用的requestID值。

contents.text: A.2 GEN0202 Added comment to DigitMapValue indicating time units for timers.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 GEN0202在DigitMapValue中添加了注释，指出计时器的时间单位。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Added comment indicating coding of Value for GEN0202 ServiceChangeReason. Cleaned up in Geneva to use ASN.1 and BER in their proper places.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601增加了注释，说明GEN0202 ServiceChangeReason的值编码。在日内瓦进行清理，以便在适当的位置使用ASN.1和BER。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Inserted missing extension marker in ServiceChangeParm production.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601在ServiceChangeParm生产中插入缺失的扩展标记。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Aligned definition of mtpAddress in ServiceChangeAddress with that in MId.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601将ServiceChangeAddress中mtpAddress的定义与MId中的定义对齐。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Added timestamp to ServiceChangeResParm.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601将时间戳添加到ServiceChangeResParm。

contents.text: A.2 IGDUB Changed type of profileName in ServiceChangeProfile to IA5String.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IGDUB将ServiceChangeProfile中的profileName类型更改为IA5String。

contents.text: A.2 IG0601 Made returned value optional in statisticsParameter, to support auditCapability result.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 IG0601将返回值设置为统计参数中的可选值，以支持auditCapability结果。

contents.text: A.2 GEN0202 Added reference to ISO 8601:1988 for TimeNotation.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2 GEN0202增加了ISO 8601:1988的时间符号参考。

contents.text: A.2 IG1100 Value production modified to support the sublist parameter type.
contents.zh-CHS: A.2修改IG1100生产值以支持子列表参数类型。

contents.text: A.3 IG1100 Corrected ABNF for digitStringlisT, replacing "/" with "|".
contents.zh-CHS: A.3 IG1100纠正了数字字符串的ABNF，将“/”替换为“|”。

contents.text: A.3 IG1100 Added parentheses to digitMapRange production.
contents.zh-CHS: A.3 IG1100为digitMapRange产品添加了括号。

contents.text: A.3 IG1100 Replaced more abbreviated syntax for pathName with fuller definition and constraints copied from B.2.
contents.zh-CHS: A.3 IG1100使用从B.2复制的更完整的定义和约束替换了路径名的更简短语法。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Added note warning that the syntax alone does not provide a complete description of the constraints, but must be supplemented by a reading of the text and comments.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB补充说明警告：仅语法不能提供约束的完整描述，但必须通过阅读文本和注释进行补充。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added note warning that the interpretation of symbols is context-dependent.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601增加了警告，即符号的解释取决于上下文。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Added comment to indicate case insensitivity of protocol (excepting SDP) and ABNF.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100增加了注释，以表明协议（SDP除外）和ABNF的不区分大小写。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Expanded upon and capitalized this comment.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601对该评论进行了扩展并大写。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Lengthy note added on the coding of the VALUE construct.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601附加在价值结构编码上的冗长注释。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Deleted sentence in note suggesting that packages could add new types for properties, parameters, or statistics.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB删除了注释中的一句话，建议包可以添加新的属性、参数或统计类型。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added note indicating that parsers should allow for white space preceding the first line of SDP in Local or Remote.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601增加了注释，指出解析器应允许在本地或远程SDP的第一行之前留有空白。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Added comments identifying the O- and W- tags.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB增加了识别O型和W型标签的注释。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Moved wildcard tag up from individual commands to commandRequestList.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100将通配符标记从单个命令移动到commandRequestList。

contents.text: B.2 GEN0202 Added additional error case to actionReply.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 GEN0202在actionReply中添加了额外的错误案例。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Modified syntax of auditOther to allow return of terminationID only.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601修改了auditOther的语法，只允许返回terminationID。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Corrected upper limit for V4hex.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB修正V4hex的上限。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Corrected and expanded comments describing mtpAddress form of MId.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100修改和扩展了说明MId的mtpAddress格式的注释。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Modified comment to mediaParm to make streamParms and StreamDescriptor mutually exclusive.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601修改了对mediaParm的注释，使StreamParm和StreamDescriptor互斥。

contents.text: B.2 GEN0202 Modified comment further to indicate at most one instance of terminationStateDescriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 GEN0202进一步修改了注释，以表示至多一个terminationStateDescriptor实例。

contents.text: B.2 GEN0202 Expanded comment for streamParm to indicate the restriction on repetition is per item.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 GEN0202 streamParm的扩展注释，表明重复限制为每个项目。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Modified "at most once" comments to localParm, terminationStateParm, and modemType, to allow multiple instances of propertyParm in the first two cases and extensionParameter in the last one.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601修改了localParm、terminationStateParm和modemType的“最多一次”注释，以允许在前两种情况下使用PropertyPart的多个实例，在最后一种情况下使用extensionParameter。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added note before description of Local and Remote, pointing out that the octet value x00 is not allowed in octetString.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601在描述本地和远程之前增加了注释，指出八位字节值x00不允许出现在八位字节字符串中。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Syntax for eventsDescriptor, embedFirst, and eventBufferDescriptor modified to make contents beyond token optional.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2修改eventsDescriptor、embedFirst和eventBufferDescriptor的IG0601语法，使令牌之外的内容成为可选内容。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Replaced "event" by "item" in comment to pkgdName because pkgdName applies to properties, signals, and statistics as well.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB将pkgdName注释中的“事件”替换为“项目”，因为pkgdName也适用于属性、信号和统计信息。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Corrected placement of EQUAL in eventDM production.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601纠正了eventDM生产中的等电位线位置。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Added comment and syntax to indicate requestID value to use in an AuditCapReply.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100添加了注释和语法，以指示在AuditCapReply中使用的requestID值。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Corrected Modem Descriptor to allow package items as properties.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100修正了调制解调器描述符，允许将包项目作为属性。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Comment to modemType changed to allow multiple instances of extensionParameter.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601对modemType的注释已更改，以允许extensionParameter的多个实例。

contents.text: B.2 GEN0202 Comment added to indicate units for Timer.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2添加GEN0202注释，以指示计时器的单位。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Added parentheses to digitMapRange production.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100为digitMapRange产品添加了括号。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Added comment to serviceChangeParm, restricting each parameter to one appearance.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100向serviceChangeParm添加了注释，将每个参数限制为一个外观。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added comments making serviceChangeMgcId and serviceChangeAddress mutually exclusive in ServiceChangeParm and servChgReplyParm.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601增加了注释，使serviceChangeMgcId和serviceChangeAddress在ServiceChangeParm和ServchGreplyPart中相互排斥。

contents.text: B.2 IGDUB Added comment to serviceChangeParm indicating that ServiceChangeMethod and ServiceChangeReason are required.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IGDUB向serviceChangeParm添加了注释，指出需要ServiceChangeMethod和ServiceChangeReason。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added Timestamp to servChgReplyParm.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601将时间戳添加到ServchGreplyPart。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added comment indicating coding of Value for ServiceChangeReason.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601增加了注释，说明ServiceChangeReason值的编码。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Modified ServiceChangeAddress to use MId definition for full address.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601修改了ServiceChangeAddress，将MId定义用于完整地址。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Made returned value optional in statisticsParameter, to support auditCapability result.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100使返回值在statisticsParameter中可选，以支持auditCapability结果。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Changed topologyDescriptor to allow multiple triples.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100更改了拓扑描述符，以允许多个三元组。

contents.text: B.2 IG0601 Added comment forbidding use of a double quote within a quotedString value.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG0601添加了禁止在quotedString值内使用双引号的注释。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 Reserved prefixes for new tokens added to signalParameter and eventParameter, to avoid collision with package names.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100为添加到signalParameter和eventParameter的新令牌保留前缀，以避免与包名称冲突。

contents.text: B.2 IG1100 EmbedToken and EmergencyToken changed to remove clash with EventBufferToken.
contents.zh-CHS: B.2 IG1100 EmbeddeToken和EmergencyToken已更改，以删除与EventBufferToken的冲突。

contents.text: B.3 IG1100 New section describing hexadecimal octet encoding.
contents.zh-CHS: B.3 IG1100描述十六进制八位字节编码的新章节。

contents.text: B.4 IG1100 New section describing hex octet sequence.
contents.zh-CHS: B.4 IG1100描述十六进制八位组序列的新章节。

contents.text: C IG1100 Added permission to use Annex C properties in LocalControl as well as in Local and Remote.
contents.zh-CHS: IG1100增加了在本地控制以及本地和远程控制中使用附录C属性的权限。

contents.text: C IG0601 Added text making support of all properties of Annex C optional.
contents.zh-CHS: C IG0601增加了对附录C所有属性的文本制作支持（可选）。

contents.text: C IGDUB Added directions to reconcile tabulated formats with allowed types for properties.
contents.zh-CHS: C IGDUB增加了将表格格式与允许的属性类型相协调的说明。

contents.text: C.1 IG1100 Corrected Q.765 reference to Q.765.5 for ACodec.
contents.zh-CHS: C.1关于ACodec的IG1100修正Q.765参考Q.765.5。

contents.text: C.1 IG1100 Deprecated Echocanc codepoint in favour of package-defined property.
contents.zh-CHS: C.1 IG1100不推荐Echocanc代码点，支持包定义属性。

contents.text: C.4 ITUPOST Updated references from Q.2961 to Q.2961.1.
contents.zh-CHS: C.4将更新后的参考文献从Q.2961发布到Q.2961.1。

contents.text: C.4 IGDUB Added details on format of VPVC.
contents.zh-CHS: C.4 IGDUB增加了有关VPVC格式的详细信息。

contents.text: C.9 IG1100 Renamed USI to layer1prot.
contents.zh-CHS: C.9 IG1100将USI重命名为Layer1保护。

contents.text: C.9 IG1100 Deprecated ECHOCI codepoint in favour of package-defined property.
contents.zh-CHS: C.9 IG1100不推荐ECHOCI代码点，支持包定义属性。

contents.text: C.9 IG1100 Added new USI property.
contents.zh-CHS: C.9 IG1100增加了新的USI属性。

contents.text: C.11 IG1100 Added m= line tag.
contents.zh-CHS: C.11增加的IG1100 m=线路标签。

contents.text: D.1 IG0601 Added explanation of ALF.
contents.zh-CHS: D.1 IG0601增加了ALF的解释。

contents.text: D.1.5 IGDUB Expanded text indicating that when trying to reestablish contact with the previously controlling MGC the MG uses the Disconnected method.
contents.zh-CHS: D.1.5 IGDUB扩展文本表明，当试图与先前控制的MGC重新建立联系时，MG使用断开连接的方法。

contents.text: E.1.2 GEN0202 Added missing EventsDescriptor parameters lines.
contents.zh-CHS: E.1.2 GEN0202添加了缺少的EventsDescriptor参数行。

contents.text: E.1.2 GEN0202 For the Signal Completion event: - corrected the description of how it is enabled - heavily edited the description of the Signal Identity observed event parameter and added a type.
contents.zh-CHS: E.1.2 GEN0202信号完成事件：-更正了如何启用它的描述-大量编辑了信号标识事件参数的描述，并添加了一个类型。

contents.text: E.1.2 IGDUB The timeout completion reason for the Signal Completion event was broadened to include other circumstances where the signal completed on its own.
contents.zh-CHS: E.1.2 IGDUB信号完成事件的超时完成原因被扩大，以包括信号自行完成的其他情况。

contents.text: E.1.2 IG1100 Added signal list ID observed event parameter to the Signal Completion event.
contents.zh-CHS: E.1.2 IG1100在信号完成事件中添加了信号列表ID观测事件参数。

contents.text: E.2.1 IG0601 Added missing read only, read-write specifications.
contents.zh-CHS: E.2.1 IG0601增加了缺失的只读、读写规范。

contents.text: E.2.1 IG0601 Split ProvisionalResponseTimer properties into one for MG, one for MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: E.2.1 IG0601将临时响应物属性分为一个用于MG，一个用于MGC。

contents.text: E.3 GEN0202 Added "Designed to be extended only" to tonegen package description.
contents.zh-CHS: E.3 GEN0202在tonegen包装说明中增加了“仅设计用于扩展”。

contents.text: E.4 GEN0202 Added "Designed to be extended only" to tonedet package description.
contents.zh-CHS: E.4 GEN0202在tonedet包装说明中增加了“仅设计用于扩展”。

contents.text: E.4.2 GEN0202 Added type for tone ID observed parameter for Long Tone Detected event.
contents.zh-CHS: E.4.2 GEN0202为长音检测事件的音调ID观测参数添加了类型。

contents.text: E.6.2 IG1100 Corrected binary identifier for digit map completion event to avoid clash with base package.
contents.zh-CHS: E.6.2 IG1100更正了数字映射完成事件的二进制标识符，以避免与基本包冲突。

contents.text: E.6.2 IG1100 Removed procedural text.
contents.zh-CHS: E.6.2 IG1100删除了程序文本。

contents.text: E.6.5 IG1100 Added procedural text indicating where to find the applicable digit map and indicating the error to return if the parameter is missing.
contents.zh-CHS: E.6.5 IG1100添加了程序文本，指示在何处查找适用的数字映射，并指示如果缺少参数将返回的错误。

contents.text: E.6.5 IG0601 Further modified procedural text.
contents.zh-CHS: E.6.5 IG0601进一步修改了程序文本。

contents.text: E.7.3 IG1100 Corrected text identifier for payphone recognition tone to avoid clash with base package.
contents.zh-CHS: E.7.3 IG1100更正了付费电话识别音的文本标识符，以避免与基本软件包冲突。

contents.text: E.10.5 IGDUB Provided informative references for tones and procedures for continuity check.
contents.zh-CHS: E.10.5 IGDUB为连续性检查的音调和程序提供了信息参考。

contents.text: E.13 GEN0202 Added note that TDM package could also apply to other transports.
contents.zh-CHS: E.13 GEN0202补充说明TDM包也可适用于其他运输工具。

contents.text: E.13.1 IG1100 Changed default for echo cancellation from "on" to provisioned.
contents.zh-CHS: E.13.1 IG1100将回音取消的默认设置从“打开”更改为“已设置”。

contents.text: E.13.1 IG0601 Corrected type for gain property.
contents.zh-CHS: E.13.1 IG0601已更正增益属性的类型。

contents.text: Appendix TTPOST Included a number of corrections which were I not picked up in H.248.1 Amendment 1 but which do appear in H.248.1 v2.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录TTPOST包含了H.248.1修订件1中未提及的一些更正，但这些更正确实出现在H.248.1 v2中。

contents.text: Intellectual Property Rights
contents.zh-CHS: 知识产权

contents.text: The ITU draws attention to the possibility that the practice or implementation of this RFC may involve the use of a claimed Intellectual Property Right. The ITU takes no position concerning the evidence, validity or applicability of claimed Intellectual Property Rights, whether asserted by ITU members or others outside of the Recommendation development process.
contents.zh-CHS: 国际电联提请注意，本RFC的实践或实施可能涉及使用声称的知识产权。国际电联对所主张的知识产权的证据、有效性或适用性不采取任何立场，无论这些知识产权是由国际电联成员主张的，还是在建议制定过程之外的其他人主张的。

contents.text: As of the date of approval of this RFC, the ITU had received notice of intellectual property, protected by patents, which may be required to implement this RFC. However, implementors are cautioned that this may not represent the latest information and are therefore strongly urged to consult the TSB patent database.
contents.zh-CHS: 截至本RFC批准之日，ITU已收到实施本RFC可能需要的受专利保护的知识产权通知。但是，实施者应注意，这可能不代表最新信息，因此强烈建议咨询TSB专利数据库。

contents.text: The IETF has also received notice of intellectual property claims relating to Megaco/H.248.1. Please consult the IETF IPR announcements at http://www.ietf.org/ipr.html.
contents.zh-CHS: IETF还收到了与Megaco/H.248.1有关的知识产权索赔通知。请参阅IETF知识产权公告，网址为http://www.ietf.org/ipr.html.

contents.text: Acknowledgments
contents.zh-CHS: 致谢

contents.text: Megaco/H.248.1 is the result of hard work by many people in both the IETF and in ITU-T Study Group 16. This section records those who played a prominent role in ITU-T meetings, on the Megaco list, or both.
contents.zh-CHS: Megaco/H.248.1是IETF和ITU-T研究组16中许多人努力工作的结果。本节记录了在ITU-T会议、Megaco名单或两者中发挥突出作用的人员。

contents.text: Megaco/H.248 owes a large initial debt to the MGCP protocol (RFC 2705), and thus to its authors, Mauricio Arango, Andrew Dugan, Ike Elliott, Christian Huitema, and Scott Pickett. Flemming Andreasen does not appear on this list of authors, but was a major contributor to the development of both MGCP and Megaco/H.248.1. RFC 3435 has an extensive acknowledgement of many other people who worked on media gateway control before Megaco got started.
contents.zh-CHS: Megaco/H.248对MGCP协议（RFC 2705）以及其作者Mauricio Arango、Andrew Dugan、Ike Elliott、Christian Huitema和Scott Pickett负有巨大的初始债务。Flemming Andreasen并未出现在该作者名单上，但对MGCP和Megaco/H.248.1的发展做出了重大贡献。RFC 3435广泛认可在Megaco启动之前从事媒体网关控制工作的许多其他人员。

contents.text: The authors of the first Megaco RFCs (2805, then 3015) were Fernando Cuervo, Nancy Greene, Abdallah Rayhan, Christian Huitema, Brian Rosen, and John Segers. Christian Groves conceived and was editor of Annex C. The people most active on the Megaco list in the period leading up to the completion of RFC 2885 were Brian Rosen, Tom Taylor, Nancy Greene, Christian Huitema, Matt Holdrege, Chip Sharp, John Segers, Michael Thomas, Henry Sinnreich, and Paul Sijben. The people who sacrificed sleep and meals to complete the massive amount of work required in the decisive Study Group 16 meeting of February, 2000, were Michael Brown, Ranga Dendi, Larry Forni, Glen Freundlich, Christian Groves, Alf Heidemark, Steve Magnell, Selvam Rengasami, Rich Rubin, Klaus Sambor, John Segers, Chip Sharp, Tom Taylor, and Stephen Terrill.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一批Megaco RFC（2805，然后是3015）的作者是Fernando Cuervo、Nancy Greene、Abdallah Rayhan、Christian Huitema、Brian Rosen和John Segers。Christian Groves孕育并担任附录C的编辑。在RFC 2885完成之前的时期，Megaco名单上最活跃的人是Brian Rosen、Tom Taylor、Nancy Greene、Christian Huitema、Matt Holdrege、Chip Sharp、John Segers、Michael Thomas、Henry Sinnreich和Paul Sijben。为了完成2000年2月第16次决定性研究小组会议所需的大量工作，牺牲了睡眠和膳食的人有迈克尔·布朗、兰加·登迪、拉里·福尼、格伦·弗伦德利奇、克里斯蒂安·格罗夫斯、阿尔夫·海德马克、史蒂夫·马格纳尔、塞尔瓦姆·伦加萨米、里奇·鲁宾、克劳斯·桑博、约翰·塞格斯、奇普·夏普、汤姆·泰勒、，还有斯蒂芬·特瑞尔。

contents.text: The most active people on the Megaco list in the period since the February 2000 have been Tom Taylor, Brian Rosen, Christian Groves, Madhu Babu Brahmanapally, Troy Cauble, Terry Anderson, Chuong Nguyen, and Kevin Boyle, but many other people have been regular contributors. Brian Rosen did tremendous service in putting together the Megaco interoperability tests. On the Study Group 16 side, the editorial team for the final revised document in February, 2002 included Christian Groves, Marcello Pantaleo, Terry Anderson, Peter Leis, Kevin Boyle, and Tom Taylor.
contents.zh-CHS: 自2000年2月以来，Megaco榜单上最活跃的人是汤姆·泰勒、布赖恩·罗森、克里斯蒂安·格罗夫斯、玛杜·巴布·布拉马纳帕利、特洛伊·考布尔、特里·安德森、阮楚瑜和凯文·博伊尔，但其他许多人都是定期撰稿人。Brian Rosen在组织Megaco互操作性测试方面做出了巨大的贡献。在研究组16方面，2002年2月最终修订文件的编辑团队包括克里斯蒂安·格罗夫斯、马塞洛·潘塔莱奥、特里·安德森、彼得·莱斯、凯文·博伊尔和汤姆·泰勒。

contents.text: Tom Taylor as Megaco Chair managed the day to day operation of the Megaco list, with Brian Rosen taking an equal share of the burden for most of the last three years. Glen Freundlich as the Study Group 16 Rapporteur ran the ITU-T meetings and ensured that all of the work at hand was completed. Without Glen's determination the Megaco/H.248
contents.zh-CHS: Megaco主席汤姆·泰勒（Tom Taylor）负责管理Megaco名单的日常运作，布莱恩·罗森（Brian Rosen）在过去三年的大部分时间里承担着同等的责任。Glen Freundlich作为第16研究组报告员主持了ITU-T会议，并确保手头的所有工作都已完成。未经格伦测定，Megaco/H.248

contents.text: standard would have taken at least half a year longer to produce. Christian Groves filled in ably as Rapporteur when Glen could no longer take part.
contents.zh-CHS: 《标准》的制作至少需要半年的时间。当格伦不能再参加时，克里斯蒂安·格罗夫斯干练地担任报告员。
